entry.value: Read CSV data into KNIME including only column names that match a regular expression

# A typical use case would be List Files node > TableRow to Variable Loop Start > R Table Source %%00010# using the file path from the loop start to read in a file using some special library in R. Here %%00010# we simply use the read.csv method.%%00010%%00010%%00010# map filepath from a flow variable here.%%00010path = "<PathToFile>"%%00010%%00010# Read a file%%00010file = read.csv(path)%%00010%%00010# Show column names%%00010colnames(file)%%00010%%00010# Choose some columns%%00010col_index = grep("*regex*", names(file))%%00010data = file[col_index]%%00010%%00010# Export to KNIME, requires a data frame.%%00010knime.out <- data
